Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a game-winning home run in the 9th inning, ending a no-hitter threat
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor expressed his emotions about the win and the significance of the day
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets won their fifth straight series and took a one-game lead on the Braves for the third National League Wild Card spot
Others: The Mets' offense had been struggling before the game, only striking out once and having their fair share of hard contact
